     FROM [sys].[objects] o
     WHERE [o].[type] = 'U'

    (SELECT *
     FROM [sys].[objects] o
     WHERE [o].[type] = 'U'
     AND [o].[is_ms_shipped] = 0
     AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT *
         FROM [sys].[extended_properties] AS [ep]
         WHERE [ep].[major_id] = [o].[object_id]
             AND [ep].[minor_id] = 0
             AND [ep].[class] = 1
             AND [ep].[name] = N'microsoft_database_tools_support'
    )
)

     WHERE [o].[type] = 'U'
     AND [o].[is_ms_shipped] = 0
     AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT *
         FROM [sys].[extended_properties] AS [ep]
         WHERE [ep].[major_id] = [o].[object_id]
             AND [ep].[minor_id] = 0
             AND [ep].[class] = 1
             AND [ep].[name] = N'microsoft_database_tools_support'
    )
)
SELECT 1 ELSE SELECT 0

    SELECT TOP(1) [u].[Id], [u].[CreatedBy], [u].[CreatedDate], [u].[Email], [u].[IsActive], [u].[ModifiedBy], [u].[ModifiedDate], [u].[Name], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[RoleId], [r].[Id] AS [Id0], [r].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [r].[CreatedDate] AS [CreatedDate0], [r].[Description], [r].[ModifiedBy] AS [ModifiedBy0], [r].[ModifiedDate] AS [ModifiedDate0], [r].[Name] AS [Name0]
    FROM [Users] AS [u]
    INNER JOIN [Roles] AS [r] ON [u].[RoleId] = [r].[Id]
    WHERE [u].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [s]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [l].[Id], [l].[Comments], [l].[CreatedBy], [l].[CreatedDate], [l].[DeliveryDate], [l].[ItemId], [l].[ModifiedBy], [l].[ModifiedDate], [l].[RequestDate], [l].[ReturnDate], [l].[Status], [l].[UserId], [i].[Id] AS [Id0], [i].[Category], [i].[Code], [i].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [i].[CreatedDate] AS [CreatedDate0], [i].[Location], [i].[ModifiedBy] AS [ModifiedBy0], [i].[ModifiedDate] AS [ModifiedDate0], [i].[Name], [i].[Status] AS [Status0]
    FROM [Loans] AS [l]
    INNER JOIN [Items] AS [i] ON [l].[ItemId] = [i].[Id]
) AS [s0] ON [s].[Id] = [s0].[UserId]
ORDER BY [s].[Id], [s].[Id0], [s0].[Id]

        FROM [Users] AS [u]
        WHERE LOWER([u].[Email]) = @__ToLower_0) THEN CAST(1 AS bit)

    SELECT TOP(1) [i].[Id], [i].[Category], [i].[Code], [i].[CreatedBy], [i].[CreatedDate], [i].[Location], [i].[ModifiedBy], [i].[ModifiedDate], [i].[Name], [i].[Status]
    FROM [Items] AS [i]
    WHERE [i].[Id] = @__id_0
) AS [i0]
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT [l].[Id], [l].[Comments], [l].[CreatedBy], [l].[CreatedDate], [l].[DeliveryDate], [l].[ItemId], [l].[ModifiedBy], [l].[ModifiedDate], [l].[RequestDate], [l].[ReturnDate], [l].[Status], [l].[UserId], [u].[Id] AS [Id0], [u].[CreatedBy] AS [CreatedBy0], [u].[CreatedDate] AS [CreatedDate0], [u].[Email], [u].[IsActive], [u].[ModifiedBy] AS [ModifiedBy0], [u].[ModifiedDate] AS [ModifiedDate0], [u].[Name], [u].[PasswordHash], [u].[RoleId]
    FROM [Loans] AS [l]
    INNER JOIN [Users] AS [u] ON [l].[UserId] = [u].[Id]
) AS [s] ON [i0].[Id] = [s].[ItemId]
ORDER BY [i0].[Id], [s].[Id]

INNER JOIN [Items] AS [i] ON [l].[ItemId] = [i].[Id]
WHERE [l].[Status] = 3 AND [l].[ReturnDate] IS NULL AND [l].[DeliveryDate] IS NOT NULL AND [l].[DeliveryDate] < @__overdueThreshold_0
ORDER BY [l].[DeliveryDate]
